description: TOP SELLING PHYTOCERAMIDE 350 mg SUPPLEMENT ON AMAZON FOR A REASONPhytoceramides are an amazing skin supplement, as explained by Dr. Oz and a team of leading dermatologists.  But figuring out which one to buy can be confusing.THAT IS WHY WE HAVE DONE ALL THE RESEARCH FOR YOU.There are 3 CRITICAL FACTORS you should look for when making your decision.1. How Much Plant-Derived Ceramide in the supplement?Most brands offer just 40mg or less.  Not ours. We have formulated our supplement to contain thedermatologist recommended 350 mg. Choose 350 mg because Dermatologists agree that 350 mg is the optimal dosage to see results!2. Rice-Base Ceramides Are NOT More Effective Than Wheat-Based Ceramides:The "study" many sellers on Amazon refer to does not compare 350 mg of Wheat-Based Ceramides to Rice-Based Ceramides. It's simply not true!Dermatologists recommend 350 mg of Plant-Based Ceramides over and over.3. Vegan Capsules.Phytoceramides work BEST because they are a plant-derived supplement. Do not jeopardize your possible results by using an artificial, synthetic, or animal derived capsule made out of gelatin. It doesn't make sense!The sooner you get started, the better your skin will look.Click "Add to Cart" now because we run out of inventory fast.
title: Phytoceramides 350 mg Plant Derived Capsule
